pr_title: Include vendored code notices in distribution notice files

timeline.message: Included vendored code notices in distribution notice files
Handle projects with no license file directory

Apply review suggestion

Co-authored-by: Rory Hunter <pugnascotia@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: One challenge here is that we have made modifications to these files, and my understanding is that we're suppose to indicate that. That is, this is not a direct copy of EvictingQueue from Guava, but rather the starting point, and then we made some modifications in place which are of course not copyright the Guava authors.
timeline.author: jasontedor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,20 +1,17 @@
-/*
- * Licensed to Elasticsearch under one or more contributor
- * license agreements. See the NOTICE file distributed with
- * this work for additional information regarding copyright
- * ownership. Elasticsearch licenses this file to you under
- * the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may
- * not use this file except in compliance with the License.
+/* @notice
+ * Copyright (C) 2012 The Guava Authors

replies.bodyText: Same situation for our Guice fork. What's the right course of action here? Do we require a slightly different header, or include both the ES one and the vendored one?
replies.author: mark-vieira

replies.bodyText:
@jasontedor can we push forward on this as-is or do you suspect we need to change these headers?
@tomcallahan do you have thoughts on the proper way to handle vendored code that is not a direct copy, but has been modified?
replies.author: mark-vieira
tomcallahan

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/server/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/common/collect/EvictingQueue.java b/server/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/common/collect/EvictingQueue.java
index f74f742faba..802697ec016 100644
--- a/server/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/common/collect/EvictingQueue.java
+++ b/server/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/common/collect/EvictingQueue.java

@@ -12,6 +12,8 @@
  * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
  * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
  * limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * Modifications copyright (C) 2020 Elasticsearch B.V.
  */
 
 package org.elasticsearch.common.collect;

timeline.bodyText: nit: this comment block should be before the package statement, for consistency with the rest of our files
timeline.author: rjernst

 /* @notice

timeline.message: Add modifications copyright notice on vendored code
